div.span: Define the values of the fields Webhook Key and Whatsapp Security Key. You should set some random value of your choice for this fields. Ensure that facebook will be able to comunicate with your server.
div.h2: Creating the Application from meta developer

ol.li:
Access
Meta developer platform.
Create a new application.
Select the Other option, then Business in order to create Whatsapp manager
Select a name and create it
Select the Whatsapp API on the products of the application
Select the business that you will use
Go to Whatsapp / API Configuration men√∫.
Add a new number.
Copy the phone identification number to the field Whastapp From phone field.
Access the menu Configuration / Basic information.
Show the secret key of the application and copy it to the Webhook secret field.
Access the menu Configuration / Advanced Options.
Copy the API Version on the Whastapp Version field.
Access your meta business site.
Access your business settings menu
Go to Users / System Users and create a new one with administrator
Once it is created, Generate a new token related to the created app with no expiry and give access to all whatsapp permissions.
Copy the token value to token field in this page.
Save this record. All the values have been filled
Press the button Integrate webhook.
On Facebook Develpment, return to the app menu and go to Whatsapp / Configuration.
Click on Edit Button on the webhook area.
On the wizard, fill the URL field with Webhook URL field of the gateway. For the verification identifier, use the Whatsapp Security Key field.
Verify and save the wizard.

If no error is raised, refresh this gateway data, and you should see that it is integrated. You should be able to receive and send messages. If an error is raised, check that the fields are filled properly and that facebook server is able to access your server.
